code: import React from'react';import ServiceCard from'./ServiceCard';import{Col}from'reactstrap';import transferImg from'../assets/images/transfer.png';import toursImg from'../assets/images/tours.png';import customizationImg from'../assets/images/customization.png';import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var servicesData=[{imgUrl:transferImg,title:'Transfer',desc:'Find a transfer for your trip'},{imgUrl:toursImg,title:'Tours',desc:'Find a tour for your trip'},{imgUrl:customizationImg,title:'Customization',desc:'Customize your trip'}];var ServiceList=function ServiceList(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:servicesData.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",md:"6",sm:"12",className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceCard,{item:item})},index);})});};export default ServiceList;
